ctx: intros d0 a a0 s s0 H.
intros d0 a a0 s s0 H.
exceptions.exn: The reference a0 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros d0 a a0 s s0 H.
exceptions.exn: In environment a1 : state a : ad s : state a0' : ad s0 : state H : (if (iad_conv 0 a0' =? a)%N then Some (s_produit a1 s0) else None) = Some s Unable to unify "iad_conv a a" with "a".

ctx: intros d0 a a0 s s0 H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros d0 a a0 s s0 H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros d0 a a0 s s0 H.
exceptions.exn: In environment d0_1, d0_2 : Map state a : ad s : state IHd0_1 : forall (a0 : ad) (s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a0 s0 d0_1) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a2 = Some s1 /\\ MapGet state d0_1 a1 = Some s2 IHd0_2 : forall (a0 : ad) (s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a0 s0 d0_2) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a2 = Some s1 /\\ MapGet state d0_2 a1 = Some s2 a0 : ad s0 : state HA : a0 = 0%N H : MapGet state (M2 state (M2 state (preDTA_produit_r 0%N s0 d0_1) (M0 state)) (M2 state (preDTA_produit_r 0%N s0 d0_2) (M0 state))) a = Some s Unable to unify "iad_conv a a0" with "a".

ctx: intros d0 a a0 s s0 H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros d0 a a0 s s0 H. generalize dependent s0. generalize dependent a0. induction d0. - intros a0 s0 H. simpl in H. inversion H. - intros a0 s0 H. simpl in H. destruct a0. + exists a0, a, s0, s. rewrite <- H. split; auto. split; [apply MapGet|apply MapGet]. + inversion H. - intros a0 s0 H. simpl in H. destruct a0 eqn:HA. + exists a, a0, s0, s. rewrite <- H. split; auto. split; [apply MapGet|apply MapGet]. + inversion H.
